camcapture-compression.description: if true, higher cpu utilization and low usb bandwidth

enable-mic.description: captures sound from mic if its set to true

reconnect-duration.description: time to reconnect in minutes when network disconnected

mobile-broadband-connection.description: if u use wvdial to connect set it to 'wvdial' without quotes or if u use network manager set it to connection name. If connection name contains spaces, put it in double quotes

config-modem.description: to run wvdialconf at startup put it true default false

mobile-modem-vendor-product-id.description: colon seperated vedor id and product id of mobile modem

usb-hub-vendor-product-id.description: colon seperated vedor id and product id of mobile modem

debug.description: debug value in context of basic=1, spawn=2, socket=4, gps=8, MediaManager=16, lowevel calls like signalHandler, spawn = 32, pcm=64, video capture=128, video capture low level or frequent log = 256, libavencoder=512

cmos-batt.description: true if mainboard has cmos battery else false

videoStreamingType.description: for ffmpeg and flash set to 'RTMP'; for FairPlay set to 'FMSP'
